reviewText: an intimate look at why grassroots movements start and why most ultimately fail. it shows the essence of the popular sentiment and what people mobilise around. today technology makes for more rapid assessments of situations and communication should be reasonably simpler and more accessible. but what the film captures is how symbols still inform most of our understanding of the world and how an outsider can never fully interpret the intricacies that form any organised and politicised and charged body of people. you'd have to get involved and compare and contrast notes to determine what the next move to take would be.
